name: Flickr
description: A Driver to synchronize your photos and videos with a Flickr account. This driver works only from onitu to Flickr (If you add some photos via your flickr web interface, they not be downloaded on onitu). Onitu add a tag to your file ('ONITU_TAG'), you musn't remove it, it's used to retrieve your files.
